mapper.select: SELECT hk.id, hk.user_id, hk.type, hk.tags, hk.content, hk.status, hk.create_time, CASE WHEN hks.id IS NOT NULL AND hks.is_delete = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_starred, u.username AS username, u.user_avatar AS user_avatar FROM healthy_knowledge hk LEFT JOIN healthy_knowledge_star hks ON hks.healthy_knowledge_id = hk.id AND hks.user_id = #{userId} AND hks.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = hk.user_id WHERE hk.is_delete = 0 AND hk.status = #{status} and hk.content like concat('%',#{content},'%') ORDER BY hk.create_time DESC

)
